sequential_thinking.description: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thought sequences

parameters.nextThoughtNeeded: Whether another thought step is needed (boolean)
parameters.isRevision: Whether this revises previous thinking (boolean, optional)
parameters.revisesThought: Which thought is being reconsidered (integer, optional)
parameters.needsMoreThoughts: If more thoughts are needed (boolean, optional)

use_cases: Breaking down complex problems into steps
Planning and design with room for revision
Analysis that might need course correction
Problems where the full scope might not be clear initially
Tasks that need to maintain context over multiple steps
Situations where irrelevant information needs to be filtered out

phases.usage: Strategic Intelligence Planning - Break down complex orchestration tasks
Multi-Domain Research - Structure research approach systematically
Implementation - Plan implementation steps with revision capability
Decision & Iteration - Analyze validation results and plan corrections
Meta-Orchestration Audit - Reflect on workflow and identify improvements

environment_variables.DISABLE_THOUGHT_LOGGING: Set to 'true' to disable logging of thought information
